column5: I was fortunate enough to get my hands on some of the new "ice tubes" from Bass Magnet Lures and I think they have hit a home run. The perch on Rice Lake destroyed these tubes all day. I wrote a blog about my day and the magic lure.  http://ontariooutdooradventure.blogspot.com/2012/01/magic-lure-found.html
I've had success with these tubes (different brand, but essentially the same) for small inland trout as well.

Thx for sharing Mike, they look good. I might have a hard time bumping some of my tried and true baits back to give these an honest go though.  I don't fish Lakers/whities much but I bet they would be awesome for tipping Meegs/BadBoyz as well.
